id: scenario-value-scanner-child-scenarios-neighborhood-child learns about local food systems through scanner
title: Child learns about local food systems through scanner
description: Child learns about local food systems through scanner
content:
Scenario: Child learns about local food systems through scanner
    Given Emma's neighborhood has local farmers and producers
    And the Value Scanner highlights local sourcing
    When Emma scans locally-produced items
    Then her personal_agent should explain local food systems
    And the agent should say "This was grown by farmers just 20 miles away"
    And Emma should learn about supply chains at concrete level
    And she should understand connection between her food and local land
    And regional care economies should be made visible
    And she should develop sense of place-based economic relationships
